ResearchProjectDef.label: Study of necromancy
ResearchProjectDef.description: To begin studying necromancy, I must first obtain a crystallized form of necrotic energy. Perhaps I should experiment on the undead themselves. My ability to consume corpses lets me convert dead flesh into necrotic archites, but what happens when that flesh is already moving and brimming with energy? ---Use Consume Corpses on a still-moving undead to obtain your first crystal.---

ResearchProjectDef.label: control expansion
ResearchProjectDef.description: Increasing the limit of undead I can control should be possible in theory, but each increase disrupts all known variables. Progress must be made carefully, step by step.

ResearchProjectDef.label: intermediate necromancy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Channeling a greater concentration of necrotic energy into a single undead enhances its strength and speed, even granting regeneration. However, the strain on the mind to control such an entity increases significantly.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced necromancy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Infusing extreme amounts of necrotic energy into a body is dangerous, most simply rupture from the strain. Yet, I have succeeded. These undead regenerate at an astonishing rate, flesh reforming even from total desiccation. Their minds retain fragments of their past selves, their cognitive abilities enhanced beyond previous limits. The mental effort to control them is immense, but the results are undeniable. They seem to innatively know how to channel necrotic energy, but they can't store them optimally, they need to sacrifice their own flesh in order to make use of it. Fortunately they do have the ability to regenerate themselves.

ResearchProjectDef.label: unsafe casting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Through my studies, I discovered that every living or dead body harbors the potential to replicate necrotic archites. This revelation enables me to channel necromantic abilities using my own body as fuel,granting power at the expens of my own flesh.

ResearchProjectDef.label: one with death
ResearchProjectDef.description: I have fully embraced death and undeath. The unseen connection that binds me to something far beyond mortal comprehension sustains my body, keeping me alive without food, sleep, or breath. --Gain the ability to resurrect yourself using 25 Necrotic Energy or any alternative like controlled undead.

ResearchProjectDef.label: necrotic healing
ResearchProjectDef.description: By infusing undead tissue with raw necrotic energy, we can cause their flesh and bones to rapidly regenerate

ResearchProjectDef.label: Self Experimentation
ResearchProjectDef.description: The pursuit of knowledge demands sacrifice. By experimenting on myself, I can gain a firsthand understanding of the intricacies of necromantic power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: First experiment
ResearchProjectDef.description: As I study the undead, I begin to perceive something, an unseen link binding them to an unknown force. The more necrotic energy I channel through my own body, the clearer this connection becomes. Sleep and hunger fade, replaced by a deeper understanding of death and undeath.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Second experiment
ResearchProjectDef.description: The more of these archites I infuse in my body, the more I connect myself with "it", whatever it is. I feel more detached from my needs and more focused on the work that needs to be done.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Skip shambler
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Shamblers leave a trace signature of archites that is possible to locate, with this, It should be possible to skip them here. Since I can't infuse them with the archites that flow in my body they will be hostile however.

ResearchProjectDef.label: skip horde
ResearchProjectDef.description: Building upon the shambler breakthrough, I can now skip multiple shamblers at once. Their hostily means I should be careful where to skip them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Neural Shackle
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the ability to craft and install neural shackles. By studying the link between a necromancer and the undead, I learned that by using a catalyst on a living being, it's possible to recreate something similar. While Unable to fully control the living being, I can access parts of their brain, using them to help you control more undead. In a pinch, I am able to use the link to directly use their bodies as fuel for the archites.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shambler Link
ResearchProjectDef.description: By deepening the connection to the archites' trace signatures, I can establish a temporary psychic link with specially prepared shamblers. This link allows me to influence their actions subtly, redirecting their aggression or guiding them toward specific targets, though full control remains elusive.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Corrupted Archites Integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: By studying the corrupted archites that are seen reanimating corpses, we can now mimick the way they function with necrotic archites, which essentially allows us to replicate their functioning entirely. The resulting undead are not linked to the necromancer and thus we have no way of controlling them, but they are not hostile.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Constructs
ResearchProjectDef.description: By combining necrotic energy with preserved flesh, we can create stable undead constructs that serve specific purposes, such as labor or defense, without the volatility of fully reanimated corpses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Implants
ResearchProjectDef.description: Developing necromantic implants allows us to enhance living or undead bodies with archite-infused devices, improving control and resilience at the cost of deeper integration with necrotic energy.
